name: Blueprint Word
description: Blueprint Word - A minimalistic 2d puzzle game. The player has only one task - to set the letters in the given order. The provided mechanisms will help you do this. Try it - it's easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0GHz processor or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 135 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0GHz processor or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 135 MB available space
